name: FlowBot (Monumental Highs)
description: FlowBot is the flagship SaaS platform powering cannabis operations nationwide. It provides seed-to-sale compliance, AI-driven inventory management, and workforce optimization for dispensaries, cultivators, and MSOs. As the primary revenue engine of BHC, FlowBot funds the 21% perpetual flywheel that sustains all other entities.
flywheelRole: Revenue engine — funds 21% perpetual flywheel (7% each to Wildflower Labs, Seed Foundation, BHC)
flywheelConnection: Revenue flows to Wildflower Labs (accelerator equity), Seed Foundation (charitable programs), and BHC (consortium operations)

aiProduct.name: Sage
aiProduct.description: Cannabis operations AI — inventory, compliance, workforce, sales optimization

name: Outpost Media
description: Outpost Media is the content engine for the entire BHC ecosystem. Operating across YouTube, podcasts, social media, and Medium, it documents the Black Hills transformation story while providing cannabis industry news, analysis, and entertainment. Content feeds all 13 entities with social proof and investor attraction.
flywheelRole: Content engine — documents everything, creates social proof, attracts investors
flywheelConnection: Success stories from all entities feed back into content, which attracts more investors and customers

aiProduct.name: Producer AI
aiProduct.description: Content creation tools — scripts, thumbnails, SEO optimization, video editing assistance

name: Seed Foundation
description: Seed Foundation is the charitable arm of BHC, receiving 7% of FlowBot equity to fund community programs. It operates scholarships, workforce development grants, housing assistance, and community events. As a 501(c)(3), it provides tax-deductible donation pathways for investors and community members.
flywheelRole: Community anchor — receives 7% FlowBot equity, funds charitable programs
flywheelConnection: Charitable programs build community goodwill, attract talent, and create PR that benefits all entities

aiProduct.name: Impact AI
aiProduct.description: Grant writing, impact reporting, and donor management for nonprofits

name: Seed Academy
description: Seed Academy provides workforce development and training programs tailored to cannabis, technology, and rural economic development. Offering certifications, bootcamps, and apprenticeship programs, it creates the talent pipeline that all BHC entities need to scale.
flywheelRole: Talent pipeline — trains workforce for all BHC entities and partner businesses
flywheelConnection: Trained workers fill roles across BHC entities; graduates become customers, mentors, and community leaders

aiProduct.name: Mentor AI
aiProduct.description: AI learning assistant — tutoring, code review, career guidance

name: THE CULT
description: THE CULT is BHC's events and community brand, hosting annual conventions, meetups, and networking events that bring together cannabis professionals, investors, and community members. It builds tribal identity and creates high-energy gathering points for the entire ecosystem.
flywheelRole: Community builder — creates tribal identity and high-energy gathering points
flywheelConnection: Events generate media content, attract investors, build community loyalty, and drive merchandise sales

aiProduct.name: Hype AI
aiProduct.description: Event planning tools — attendee matching, scheduling, marketing automation

name: THE OP
description: THE OP is a physical community cafe and merchandise hub in Custer, SD. It serves as the street-level presence for BHC, providing a gathering space where locals and visitors experience the brand firsthand. Revenue comes from food service, BHC merchandise, and event hosting.
flywheelRole: Street-level presence — local spending hub for residents and visitors
flywheelConnection: New residents from Settle the West spend locally; cafe hosts events that feed Outpost Media content

aiProduct.name: Barista Bot
aiProduct.description: POS AI, menu optimization, inventory alerts — operational cost savings

name: Pass Creek
description: Pass Creek manages the real estate portfolio including the 15-acre Grow Campus and residential properties. It provides housing for relocated workers and commercial space for BHC entities. Revenue comes from property management, rentals, and real estate development.
flywheelRole: Housing provider — accommodates workers relocated by Settle the West
flywheelConnection: Workers need housing; residents spend at THE OP and enroll kids at Seed Academy

aiProduct.name: Property AI
aiProduct.description: Tenant management, maintenance scheduling, lease automation

name: Settle the West
description: Settle the West is a marketing and relocation program that attracts remote workers to move to the Black Hills region. It markets the quality of life, low cost of living, and BHC ecosystem benefits. Over 5 years, it aims to generate $170M+ in regional economic impact.
flywheelRole: Growth engine — brings remote workers to Black Hills, generating downstream demand
flywheelConnection: Workers need housing (Pass Creek), have kids (Seed Academy), spend locally (THE OP), create stories (Outpost Media)

aiProduct.name: Scout AI
aiProduct.description: Relocation matching tool — city, job, housing fit for prospective relocators

name: Wildflower Labs
description: Wildflower Labs is BHC's startup accelerator, receiving 7% of FlowBot equity to fund and mentor early-stage companies. It provides AI agent installation services, mentorship, and co-working space at the Grow Campus. Portfolio companies amplify the BHC ecosystem.
flywheelRole: Innovation engine — receives 7% FlowBot equity, accelerates portfolio companies
flywheelConnection: Portfolio companies create jobs, generate content, and expand the BHC technology ecosystem

aiProduct.name: Forge
aiProduct.description: Startup copilot — roadmap planning, pitch generation, product development

name: Black Hills Consortium
description: BHC is the 501(c)(6) trade association that coordinates all 13 entities. It receives 7% of FlowBot equity, manages the $105M capital raise, and provides shared services including CRM, legal, and marketing. BHC is the strategic brain that ensures all entities work in concert.
flywheelRole: Strategic brain — receives 7% FlowBot equity, coordinates all entities, manages capital raise
flywheelConnection: Funds Settle the West marketing, provides shared services, manages investor relations for the entire ecosystem

aiProduct.name: Theo
aiProduct.description: Economic development AI — data analytics, grant writing, municipal reports

name: Delegate Digital
description: Delegate Digital provides B2B digital services and AI consulting to businesses in the Black Hills and beyond. It offers website development, AI agent installation, marketing automation, and digital transformation consulting. Revenue comes from project fees and monthly retainers.
flywheelRole: Services arm — provides digital services to local businesses and BHC entities
flywheelConnection: Serves local businesses that benefit from Settle the West growth; builds technology for other BHC entities

aiProduct.name: DelegateIQ
aiProduct.description: B2B AI assistant — automation, CRM management, social media scheduling

name: AdventureCap Holdings
description: AdventureCap Holdings acquires and manages adventure tourism assets in the Black Hills region, including outdoor recreation facilities, guided tour operations, and experiential entertainment properties. It capitalizes on the region's natural assets to create tourism revenue.
flywheelRole: Tourism anchor — adventure tourism assets attract visitors and remote workers
flywheelConnection: Tourism experiences attract Settle the West prospects; creates content for Outpost Media; events hosted at THE OP

aiProduct.name: Trail AI
aiProduct.description: Tour booking, weather updates, trail recommendations — commission-based

name: Grow Campus
description: Grow Campus is the physical heart of BHC — a 15-acre property in Custer, SD valued at $2M+. It houses co-working spaces, event venues, the Wildflower Labs accelerator, and residential units. V6 separates campus operations from Pass Creek land ownership.
flywheelRole: Physical hub — houses all entities, hosts events, provides co-working and residential space
flywheelConnection: All entities benefit from shared campus space; events attract visitors; co-working space builds community

aiProduct.name: Campus AI
aiProduct.description: Facility management, scheduling, access control — operational tool
